task.title: Addressing Persistent Radiator Overheating
task.shortdesc: Investigate and resolve radiator overheating that occurs during normal driving conditions.

taskbody.prereq: Confirm that overheating is occurring under ordinary driving conditions.
taskbody.context: Persistent overheating during normal operation indicates a problem that requires attention.

step.cmd: Adjust fan blade angles if necessary
step.info: Increasing the blade angle can produce more suction

step.cmd: Consult the manual for additional troubleshooting
step.info: Reference the appropriate section for specific causes and solutions
